transArray.content: The hotel is very close to Universal Studios, and check-in is very fast and convenient. There are many free parking spaces at the door. There is a small supermarket next to it for shopping. You can go to Bali Bridge on Metro Line 1 and walk for 15 minutes to the hotel. The surrounding environment is also very good. The hotel environment is also very good. It is very clean and tidy. The curtains are fully blackout and the washing machine and dryer are very practical.
Dear guest, thank you very much for your choice. Xiaohan will continue to maintain it. If you are blown into Xiaohanâ€™s arms by the strong wind, Xiaohan will not return it. I love your Xiaohanting.
